credit_line: Gift of Barry Friedman and Patricia Pastor
title: Valentine
description: Red plastic rectangular typewriter (a); open keyboard with standard alphabet on black keys; two ribbon spools, each with orange button in center; red handle on back. Contoured, rectangular matt red plastic case (b), open on one side, into which typewriter slides; black rubber tab on each side of opening that attach to and secure typewriter.
name: Typewriter and cover
